name: CYBERHAX II: DEUCE
description:
CYBERHAX - ULTIMATE CHAMPIONSHIP EDITION EX - THE MOVIE: THE GAME 

II: DEUCE

Please use the FULLSCREEN Button! Low Resoultion! Play the TUTORIAL!

Welcome to my entry for SBIG JAM 2022! Theme: shhh! don't wake the tortise!

PROGRAMMING / ART / BUGS: Fistmaker

Music: King Aurorus https://kingaurorusmusic.com/

This game is a spiritual successor to the original CYBERHAX game I did back in 2018. (I do not recommend you play that...) In the sequel, HACK FILES WITH YOUR FISTS! (But WAY better this time I promise!)

This game mixes MINESWEEPER and ROCK/PAPER/SCISSORS gameplay. 

Standard Controls: (You can reconfigure in the options menu.)

W/A/S/D: Movement

1/2/3/4: Programs

In general, collect files and upload them to "The CR3W" so you can stop MEGACORP's new AI: T-0RT/SE. But be careful! If you make too much racket in the server collecting files, or ROGUE AI's are culled quickly enough, you'll start to wake the T-0RT/SE!

Check your MAIL and JOURNAL for hints on how to proceed. When your RAM is FULL of FILES, head back to your EMAIL SCREEN and click "U" to upload them to the CR3W!

Keep and eye out for HIDDEN SECRETS!
